Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Unable to read cells with % symbol" (#1688) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "fixed meta-code generation for non-english host build context" (#1686) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Meta-code generation assumes a dot as decimal point, which is not the case in French, for instance. If the host build context is using a french locale, the project could not be built.

Adding a few `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture` fixes the problem.

#1657
